events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin our review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills mentioned.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to help guide you through the upcoming stages of the recruitment process.
We successfully completed an initial screening call to discuss your background and assess your fit for the developer role.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 3PM via video conference. Please prepare accordingly.
The technical interview was completed successfully. The interviewers noted your solid understanding of software development principles.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 25th at 11AM to discuss company culture and your career aspirations.
Your HR interview was completed smoothly, and the team was impressed with your alignment to our core values.
We have extended an offer to you for the Software Engineer role, including all relevant benefits and compensation details.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
Official acceptance of the Software Engineer position offer received. We look forward to having you onboard.
Your onboarding process has started, including access setup, welcome sessions, and introduction to your engineering team.
All hiring procedures have been completed successfully and your first day as part of the engineering team is confirmed.
